title: The 30-Foot High Pile Of Bones That Could Be A DNA Treasure Trove
teaser: The Natural Trap Cave in Wyoming may hold specimens of DNA from animals who roamed thousands of years ago. Julie Meachem, a paleontologist leading the expedition into the cave, speaks with Audie Cornish about the secrets she hopes to find.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
